cards.title: We are Humans
cards.subtitle: And we love humans
cards.text: We act like humans, we talk like humans, and we think like humans. And we call out anyone who does the opposite.

cards.title: We work together
cards.subtitle: Would you like to join us?
cards.text: We insist on working collaborativelly.No rockstars. No departments. The whole owns the whole project together.

cards.title: We change
cards.subtitle: And we embrace change
cards.text: Nothing is sacred, from our habits to our rituals, to our enviroment. Change is a natural part of the human life, and we prefer to embrace it.

cards.title: We hire differently
cards.text: Most companies operate under the premise that employees should be replaceable like parts of an assembly line.

cards.title: Get autonomous
cards.text: You’re given an incredible amount of freedom and autonomy at Mindera. That goes for everyone.

cards.title: Work together
cards.text: Our flat structure calls for it by necessity. Being a leader may feel unnatural at first, but we expect everyone to step up and own part of the project.

cards.title: Human Truths #1
cards.subtitle: From the book of humans
cards.text: Humans are not perfect. Don’t be afraid to fail. And when you do, you might as well fail spectacularly. This is how we grow and learn.

cards.title: Human Truths #2
cards.subtitle: From the book of humans
cards.text: Humans are unique. Do you love Portugueses Pop Music ? Do you prefer your desk covered with sunflowers? There’s no need to hide it.

cards.title: Humans are not "resources"
cards.subtitle: Humans are humans
cards.text: We don’t have an HR department. New hires are interviewed by the people who will be working with them.
